description.value: As a Reaction, character can spend a Fate Point and expand all their actions for their next Round to switch places within an ally within 2 metres so long as no physical obstruction would prevent it. The character becomes target of any attacks previously targeting the ally.

system.benefit: As a Reaction, character can spend a Fate Point and expand all their actions for their next Round to switch places within an ally within 2 metres so long as no physical obstruction would prevent it. The character becomes target of any attacks previously targeting the ally.
